snippet.title: MLB The Show 24 - Negro Leagues Edition
snippet.description:
This is a celebration that goes beyond baseball. MLB The Show 24 Negro Leagues Edition is a tribute to the pioneers who played and the newspapers that preserved this important chapter in American history! 

Pre-order now: https://mlbthe.show/caa555

Early access begins 3/15/24
Available on 3/19/24

#MLBTheShow #OwnTheShow #UnlockHistory #NLBM
#Baseball
